title: Genie card
data:
{{Obsolete}}
The Genie card is either a jackpot, or crack rot.
* 50% chance: acts as a [[scroll of acquirement]].
* 25% chance: affects you as a [[potion of decay]].
* 25% chance: affects you as a [[potion of degeneration]].

==History==
The Genie card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] before it was removed in [[0.15]].
